entities.name: stadium
entities.description: The stadium is where the match is taking place. ("the stadium and began squinting around for the Snitch")

entities.name: lee jordan

entities.name: harry potter

entities.name: gryffindor

entities.name: professor mcgonagall
entities.description: Professor McGonagall interrupts Lee Jordan to ask him to focus on the match. ("‘Jordan, would you mind telling us what’s going on in the match?’")

entities.name: katie bell
entities.description: Katie Bell is a player for Gryffindor who is heading for goal. ("Gryﬀindor in possession, Katie Bell of Gryﬡindor heading for goal …")
